main event: A report on the sighting of an unidentified aerial object occurred on 12 November 1948, near Clark Air Force Base, Philippines.
interesting points: The object was described as snow white with a wingspan of 100 to 150 feet and a fuselage of approximately 250 feet in length,The sighting involved a witness observing the object intermittently through clouds, with it appearing to maneuver in and out of them,The observer claimed the object was faster than any known jet,This case included a request for aerodynamic analysis due to the object's unusual configuration,The report highlights that no confirmation from other sources was made regarding the object's presence.
witness description: Sgt [REDACTED], 18th Maint & Supply Gp, Clark AF Base
